label: Car Body Repair
description: Services and products related to repairing and restoring the exterior of cars, including scratches, dents, and rust.
intents: Fixing scratches and dents on car exterior
Repairing rust damage on car exterior
Restoring car body to like-new condition

subcategories.label: Scratch Repair
subcategories.description: Services and products related to repairing scratches on car exterior.

subcategories.label: Dent Repair
subcategories.description: Services and products related to repairing dents on car exterior.

subcategories.label: Rust Repair
subcategories.description: Services and products related to repairing rust damage on car exterior.

subcategories.label: Bumper Repair
subcategories.description: Services and products related to repairing bumper damage on car exterior.

subcategories.label: Alloy Wheel Repair
subcategories.description: Services and products related to repairing damage to alloy wheels on car exterior.
